The cõplaynte of a louers lyfe Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
[24] p.
By Wynkyn de Worde, Jmprinted at London in the Fletestrete at the sygne of the Sonne : [1531?]
Date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.). STC (2nd ed.) lists this item as "Anr. ed." of the "Complaint of the black knight." Imprint from colophon. Imperfect: print show-through. Signatures: A-B⁶. Reproduction of original in: British Library.
